quote: This is going to be an earlier spring market than ever... buyers are going to be out there hot and heavy.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the typical expectation of a slow winter market, suggesting early opportunities.
suggested_hook: Why this spring market might surprise you!

quote: If you don't ask, you're not going to get... a $10,000 credit can lower a client's payment by $500 a month.
why_clipworthy: Provides a specific, actionable tactic that can directly impact buyer affordability.
suggested_hook: How a simple ask can save your clients $500 a month!
